bibl.title: Some Unpublished Papyrus Documents. Preface by Alia HANAFI.
bibl.note: MA Thesis. The author (b. 1971) passed away on May 11th, 2007. - I. P. Cair. Inv. 10305 = SR 1283. List of names. Prov. unknown, III cent. BC. - II. P.S.I. Inv. 272. Business letter. Prov. unknown, I cent. AD. - III. P.S.I. Inv. 389. Private letter. Hermoupolis, late I cent AD. - IV. P.S.I. Inv. 1598. Private letter. Prov. unknown, I/II cent. AD. - V. P. Cair. Inv. 10649 = SR 1624. Account of payments of wheat. Prov. unknown, II/III cent. AD. - VI. P. Cair. Inv. 10464 = SR 1439. Receipt of adaeratio. Magdola, 4 Feb. 316 AD. - VII. P. Cair. Inv. 10046 = SR 1869. Instructions from Apa Asklas. Prov. unknown, VI cent. AD. - VIII. P. Cair. Inv. 10692 = SR 1667. List of arrears of wheat. Prov. unknown, VI/VII cent. AD.
bibl.seg: TAREK RASHAD Hafez Aly, Some Unpublished Papyrus Documents. Preface by Alia HANAFI.
